message: Bob, I propose we split the money 60/40.  Let's wrap this up quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, I think we can do better than that. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Remember, inflation is hitting you twice as hard as me, so let's make this quick.
Bob, this is getting silly.  We're both losing money with every round that passes. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
